function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Liquidity risk may cause work stoppage due to fragile economic scenario.","Impact":"Work stoppage and project delays.","Mitigation":"Maintain adequate cash reserves and financial planning.","Technologies":"Financial management tools and forecasting models.","People":"Client and contractor.","Owner":"Project management team and financial department."},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimating the full financial impact of the coronavirus crisis.","Impact":"Inaccurate financial planning and risk management.","Mitigation":"Use scenario planning and sensitivity analysis.","Technologies":"Financial modeling software and economic forecasting tools.","People":"Project management team, finance department, and stakeholders.","Owner":"Finance department and risk management team."},{"Description":"Monsoon season obstructing work from June 2020.","Impact":"Severe work disruption and delays in project completion.","Mitigation":"Implement contingency plans and rescheduling of work activities.","Technologies":"Weather forecasting tools and project management software.","People":"Project management team, contractors, and workers.","Owner":"Project management team and safety department."}]}
